title: Job-Based Language Learning: Ethnographic Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension skills and work environment experience
context.additional_context: Learners perform language projects reflecting actual job situations in a blended learning environment using smartphone apps and offline tools. Strengthens practical skills through field observation documentation and peer feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use situation-specific language expressions required in job-related scenarios (meetings, customer consultations, etc.) with over 90% accuracy.
Through collaborative projects with peers, learners document the language acquisition process (voice recordings/notes) and self-assess learning outcomes based on this documentation.
Learners can apply ethnographic methods to observe real work environments, analyze language usage patterns, and develop communication strategies reflecting the analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
